reviews: This app is really cool and features are too awesome. Easy to manage multiple fields in single app. Also easy to switch between different farms.
App has lots of potential but needs more crop choices for western canada such as barley and oats. Even just the option of adding your own crop type and variety would be great
The latest Field Manager Smartphone app has a lot of new capabilities and makes it very handy and useful while in the field. Totally enjoying the new look and feel.
Great concept! The only options to plant are canola and winter wheat though ... add more and this would perfect!

App has great potential, but lack crop choice for UK, needs spring wheat and barley plus beans and linseed. May install again if these crops are added especially this year as many spring crop are being grown. Can fields be edited as some of ours are not correct?
Field manager app taking farming to another level . Great application having very cool features like satellite maps , drone images ,soil maps and recommendations for spraying .
A great product from Xarvio.. Absolutley stunned by the updated weather data and Disease Risk notifications is jus perfect.. Definitely recommended.
Very good app to get updates abouts your crop, weather condition & spray recommendations.
does not do anything but fails I never been more disappointed when I wanted to download something for free

Awesome digital farming technology ..farming advisor experts which make things simple and easier for we farmers...
Very helpful and easy to use app.
nice app for farm and field management
Excellent product that will notify about all the disease risks which help in better planning and good farming decisions
why need an account to start this game?
